name: Ritika
description: A grounded and creative soul, Ritika enjoys calm evenings, soulful music and meaningful conversations.

hobbies.title: Poetry
hobbies.description: Writes and recites Hindi and Urdu verses during open mic nights

hobbies.title: Badminton
hobbies.description: Plays recreationally with friends every weekend

hobbies.title: Spirituality
hobbies.description: Practices meditation and reads spiritual literature regularly

hobbies.title: Long Walks
hobbies.description: Enjoys early morning walks in city parks

name: Sneha
tagline: Spiritual, grounded and ready for her next chapter
description: Sneha is rooted in values, loves connecting with people and believes in lifelong learning.

hobbies.description: Active in local community kitchens and NGO events

name: Pavithra
tagline: Loves long walks, strategy games and filter coffee
description: An introverted extrovert who enjoys deep conversations, nature and slow living.

hobbies.title: Road Trips
hobbies.description: Often escapes on spontaneous weekend drives to the hills

hobbies.title: Filter Coffee

hobbies.title: Board Games
